name: Indie VTuber Showdown Demo
description:
This is the demo of the Indie VTuber Showdown Mod by Crystal Blitz!

IMPORTANT:

RUNNING THE MOD HERE IN ITCH.IO MAY LAG YOUR PC DUE TO ME MODIFYING PROJECT.XML'S PRELOAD VARIABLE BECAUSE IT WOULDN'T LOAD THE IMAGES!

For short, it means DO NOT RUN THIS ON LOW END PCS! i recommend you download the gamebanana version instead...
